page.title: 10Organisations-Winmarleigh(4)
page.content: {-Winmarleigh Young Farmers' Club-} The Y.F.C. meets weekly throughout the winter months in the school.It has a large membership drawn from a wide area as well as the village itself. Although it is self-organising it can call upon the expertise of its own {Advisory Committee.} {-The Village Hall Committee-} This is probably the most important committee in the village and has the task of maintaining a clean and well- appointed venue.It has to supplement its income from letting with its own fund-raising events. {-Winmarleigh Mothers' Union- } A small M.U. branch of S.Luke's Church which manages to retain independence from Cockerham as wellas close links. {-The Farmers' Ball Committee- It has as its sole purpose the organsing of the Ball each March.
